website_summaries.verdict: A strip formulated with medicinal qualities to produce photogenic results.
pros: Designed to adhere to most nose shapes for an optimal cleanse
Reduces pores in just three easy steps
Reviewers love the results and price point
cons: Medicinal smell may be too harsh for some

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have always struggle with big open black and white pores on my nose. However since using these nose strips, some of the big pores on my nose has either shrunk or disappearead. It does have distinct smell but it doesnt bother me. The way the strip stays on your skin is also very sturdy. You wont have to worry about the sides coming off. If you have always struggle with many blackhead and whitehead it doesn't hurt to try. These nose strips will not make you disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lord

customer_reviews.title: Better than Biore
customer_reviews.text: The blackheads I have are deeper than most people's, so for me these worked especially well. They pulled a fair amount of stuff out. Biore strips are pretty flimsy and whatever adhering agent they use seems to be able to get too watery/milky and not bond or conversely not be saturated enough with moisture to bond. These are much thicker and have a thick shiny solid gel on the side you stick to your skin. I think that's why they bond better. They seem to cover more area of the nose and also the design seems to adhere to the 3-D shape of the nose too. My nose is not small, so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Strips are not as sticky as store-bought ones
customer_reviews.text: I tried these since they were cheaper than the Biore ones that I usually use. When you peel the strip from it's backing, a lot of them come right off and they're not very sticky. You can apply these 2-3 times in lieu of 1 Biore strip and then it'll have the same effect, but that's time-consuming. Edit: Updated my review to 5-stars, since Anjou displayed good customer service in actually responding to my complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! After this dries on your nose and you ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! After this dries on your nose and you remove the strip, you can see all the yuckies that it extracted from your nose. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon B.

customer_reviews.title: My Go To for Nose Strips
customer_reviews.text: I love these strips! They go on and come back off very easily, and they pull a good amount from your pours. You also receive a large amount for the price. I haven’t noticed any smell at all, although several reviewers mentioned a weird smell. I’ll definitely get them again!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: NOPE
customer_reviews.text: Blackheads are gone, but so is half of the skin on my face. I've used Biore strips for years without a problem, and know my way around my skincare - this lifted layers of skin off of my face, like a bad eyebrow wax. It's painful, unsightly, and now I'm covered in Neosporin to guard against infection and possibly scarring. (The Neosporin will, of course, clog those pores right back up, as if I cared at this point...) This happened the first time, I gave it a month of extra-gentle skincare because I thought there was a contraindication, and it happened again. Absolutely no. I can only hope I'll get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Stark

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several brands of porestrips and none of them have worked for me as well as these have. I’ve used Target brand as well as Biore and I don’t ever pull much from my pores.However this brand is a game changer. The smell is a bit off putting however it’s not too strong. The adhesion is great! I wouldn’t recommend this for anyone with delicate skin and I would not use it more than twice a week. I get a full strip everytime I use them and there is no pain involved. I highly recommend this product as at its’ price and quality it’s a great value and when I run out I will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: orangelemons

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I used them on my chin, cheeks, neck, and nose. They work great. I think they clean pores better than biore. Only complaint is they need rectangle shaped strips for the rest of your face.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Field

customer_reviews.title: best and most economical product
customer_reviews.text: I have used other strips (biore, etc.) in the past with less than desirable results. This product has been THE most effective in removing blackheads. I was SO impressed with the results. the strip is thicker than other products and stickier too in my opinion. worked SO much better than biore strips. I HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Just as effective as other name brands, but you get three times as many pore strips! I highly recommend these to anyone in search of pore strips.
customer_reviews.author: jacob harouny

customer_reviews.title: Stinky and Useless
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about these but what was I thinking! These are the absolute worst nosenstrips I've ever tried. I'm not sure if I got a crappy batch or what but let's go down the line... They STINK. Unbearable. A strong chemical smell right on your nose. Also, they aren't pliable like biore pore strips...they crack and crunch when you peel off the plastic liner. Also, some seem to be "dried" out because they are completely detached from the liner. Each strip I've used has not been like the last. Quality control is none existanT. Really bummed I missed the return window. Trash. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Nicky F

customer_reviews.title: Best so far
customer_reviews.text: The adhesion is strong, but the smell of the strips is awful, very fine like. I think there are certain season the nose the strips stuck firmer than in others. After taking it off I was surprised with the amount of gross things on the strip. Out of all the strips I have tried these have extracted out the most of my pores. I would definitely wash your nose off after wards, because some adhesive was still left on my nose.
customer_reviews.author: jenguin

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. To me, it works as well as Biore but for the fraction of the price. The only thing is that it does not go on as easy as Biore (hence why it is not a five star). I had to adjust quickly to make sure that it was on correctly. Once it dries, it removes quite a few blackheads. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ga Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! Follow recommended use frequency!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I feel like they work better than biore and are less expensive. They dont seem as sticky as you'd expect when you first put one on but as it dries it's crazy adhesive!! It hurt a little to pull it off but it worked so well. Follow the instructions on the box not to use them more than twice a week with 3 days in between each use...I used these two days in a row and it hurt my skin 😖 almost like it pulled some of my top layer of skin off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Destroys your skin
customer_reviews.text: I have given these strips several tries. Every time, they leave my nose extremely dry. For one week after the treatment, my skin has dark, deep red patches and flakes/peels off in large chunks. The strips do remove blackheads, but they work no better than Biore strips and ruin your skin. 100% do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Late 20s male

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective
customer_reviews.text: Update: while the product didn’t work very well for me, customer service at this company is great! They offered me a refund when they saw my bad review (which I turned down because I’m still going to use these strips; pulling out some whiteheads is better than nothing). Compared to Biore pore strips, these were much stickier, harder to get off, and did not pull out as many whiteheads.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: They stick well to the skin, but....
customer_reviews.text: As others have indicated, these do stick well to the skin. However, they do not adhere well to blackheads. I have larger pores and generally have a number of smaller blackhead and some larger ones. The strips do stick well, but they do not pull out nearly as many blackheads when compared to another leader brand. I purchased these because the price was great for the amount you get. However, I ended up returning to another leading company as they perform much better.
customer_reviews.author: jmboldosser

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great deal, but the quality is poor. I had zero success removing blackheads with these, but it did tear my skin. I followed the instructions provided and still had a a huge section of skin rip off and bleed. My skin is not dry or irritated, but this has damaged it and is taking a lot of time to heal.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Parallels Biore
customer_reviews.text: I love Biore pore strips, but they are a bit expensive. I tried these, and although they are not exactly the same, they work very well. They are a bit more stiff and have a different kind of smell. However, they took out just as much from my pores as the Biore strips do. My only feedback would be to have the face strips in addition to the nose strips (i.e., Biore has a combo pack, which I could not find w. this brand). Otherwise, great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: they work fine and you get a lot for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are thicker than biore strips and don’t dry quite as hard, and have a smell I associate with paste or old glue. However, they work fine and you get a lot for the money. I don’t know if I would buy them again, but there’s nothing wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Stinky but good.
customer_reviews.text: Yes. They stink. Horribly. If you can get past that they work very well. There is a slight trick to making them stick better, which I found through the comments from someone else. I run the strip under the water for a few seconds and get it really wet the wet the area on my face. I never wash my face before and doing that way has not been an issue. Wish they didn't stink so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: I am a loyal customer now...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Box is extremely sturdy and the packaging for each strip is perfect. I can’t believe I found these and better than any other brand and can’t beat the price! The only issue, I wish these were black to see whatever gross is left on the strip...also I have always had to make sure the entire strip pretty much is wet to curve over my nose or face. These are stiff, so u may want to do that, but I tell you; you won’t regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Willis

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper but inferior to name brand
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to write this so I could use these strips enough times to make an accurate assessment. These are smellier, stickier, and take longer to work than the well known brand. However they pull out very little even after completely hardened. I bought these based on price but would not purchase again and will likely not finish the box.
customer_reviews.author: misscrusty

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: These work a little worse than expected. I was hoping for better results, but they didn’t work as I would have hoped. They have a weird odor to them and the name brand ones I tried worked far better than these. My advice would be to probably just spend the extra few $ and get the ones proven to work. Just because there are more in the package, doesn’t make it a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: These things smell strongly like adhesive. It makes me think I’m putting actual tape on my face. The first use went well, but every time time since they get stuck to my skin. And I have to scrub the adhesive like material off my face. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kait Cap

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't see too much of a difference between Biore strips & these other than the smell. Same cut as Biore, same size as Biore & removed blackheads the same way. I did take off 1 star due to the smell. It smelled like Crazy glue. Especially, when you first open the package. The smell hits you pretty hard. Other than that they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying given it lower price
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat it for the price these strips are made in China and while not as good as some of the other brands on the market they work more than well enough to make them worth buying they have a pleasant smell and are easy to apply they do dry my skin a bit more and don't remove blackheads as well as some of the others but they do an adequate job for the cost
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Better options available
customer_reviews.text: The strips will stick, as long as you use water first. I usually place a hot rag on my nose first to open up my pores and maximize the blackhead removal. Sadly I find that many are left behind :( I seem to have better results from my little pore sucker machine that us women can see non-stop in our FB feed (yeah, I bought it). Not a product I will buy again, but I will use up the package I did buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Works well but smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feeling on this product. It does work as stated. The strip is a bit thicker than the name brand version but it works and does remove blackheads. The big downside is like other reviewers have mentioned it smells really bad. The smell is strong and since it’s right on your nose, you are smelling it for a good 10 mins. I’m not sure I’ll continue buying this product but will finish the package I have.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Y Chen

customer_reviews.title: Works but...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with these strips. I used them twice and both times they peeled off a layer of skin! Ouch! I was very careful peeling the strip off. If I ever use it again I will try wetting it before I remove it.
customer_reviews.author: September MorneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Works where it actually sticks
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these because they're an amazing price BUT THEY NEVER STICK RIGHT. They work where they stick but the strip is so stiff beforehand it's just impossible to bind well and it will drive you nuts to take off the strips after 15mins and see AND feel all the places it didn't stick and you're not supposed to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Best pore strips ever!
customer_reviews.text: This works better than any mask ive tried! Plus, my fiancee has bad black heads on his nose and after using these routinely (as directed not more than) his nose has been so clear! He is pickier than i and he hates masks so this was Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Works better than Biore
customer_reviews.text: The smell was strong the 1st time, but the results were AMAZING!!! I had a deep blackhead that exfoliating would not help. As pictured, it was the WORST blackhead I have ever had and it is FINALLY healing up.
customer_reviews.author: Lilli's Books

customer_reviews.title: Work fine
customer_reviews.text: The strips work just as any other brand or generic strips. They are just a little bit harder to stick to but if you make them a bit wet they become softer and stick to easier. For the price they are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pore strips
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! i used biore pore strips before these but the amount I got for the price I paid wasn't great. So I decided to try these and they work super great. They work better than biore for me. They take out all the gunky stuff and I can actually see it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Biore
customer_reviews.text: These are not as good as the Biore version. They are a little stickier making them harder to remove and it seems like they don't do as good of removing junk from my pores.
customer_reviews.author: s.kittyCA

customer_reviews.title: Actually worked well for me. Just remember to moisturize
customer_reviews.text: I used these for the first time immediately after taking a shower and it worked pretty well. I got the little pore gunk trees that I've seen in other pore strip reviews. Just remember to moisturize with some sort of lotion afterward. People with sensative skin may experience redness, which is what I experienced on parts of my face.
customer_reviews.author: eolcott01

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The product has a chemical perfume smell that give me a headache each time I try using it. The strip is super stiff even after I follow the directions to wet my nose that it won't adhere. I've used the Biore nose strips for years with no issue. Very disappointed in the product and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shirina

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to dry.. but really pulls out a ton of stuff from your nose
customer_reviews.author: HeatherMB

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to skincare routine
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pore strips I’ve used! Biore strips are more expensive and don’t perform as well for me. I use these once/week or every other week to keep my sebaceous filaments controlled and I’m really happy with how they’re working!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Will damage your skin
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. I’ve given them a few tries and every time, they destroy my skin. I’m left with red, sore, peeling skin that takes a long time to heal.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Horrible fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance was so strong, it triggered an asthmatic reaction. Had to ditch the whole box. Could not use. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: trek

customer_reviews.title: I regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to use any of these strips. It was impossible to get the backing off to apply the product. I tried no less than 5 strips and finally gave up.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Do not work
customer_reviews.text: These strips adhere to the surface but do not pull much from the pore. They have a strong chemical smell and become mushy when wet to adhere and don't dry all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Very sticky to your skin. Pulls out alot. Didnt expect the strip to be hard when you place it on but once it gets wet it doesnt the job.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Parker-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These don't work very well. Nothing pulls up when the nose strips are dry and ready for extraction. I would have returned them but didn't do to busy schedule. Will not be buying again. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not working for me
customer_reviews.text: Does not work for me, does not clean pores as i expected, soap or scrub does a better job. UPDATE: the seller reached out without me prompting for a refound as I was not satisfied with the product. This is a very nice way of handling product satisfaction, so I upgraded to 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Marcello Tomasini

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: These things actually work! If you give it time to dry properly, they will pull lots of gunk from your pores. They work so much better than some of the more popular ones that I have tried. And they are cheaper! If your debating on giving them a try, just do it! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Crain

customer_reviews.title: SO glad i found these!
customer_reviews.text: i’m absolutely OBSESSED with these. the adhesive is actually strong enough to stick to your face and remove the gunk trapped in your pores! i will never ever be without these ever again!!! finally a product that works! i read reviews about how these strips supposedly have an odor to them, let me tell you, THEY DON’T. no smell, no residue after peeling it off, nothing. these are beyond fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good Nose Strip to Prey Away Grime
customer_reviews.text: Pulls up all the gross dirt and grime stuck in your pores! The smell isn’t great but it’s 10-15mins and it doesn’t linger! Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Better than Biore
customer_reviews.text: These truly do work better than Biore pore strips. I had been using those for years and these work so well and are way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice easy to use strips. Did not clean all the areas covered by the strip as it folds in certain spots of the nose.
customer_reviews.author: Amit K

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's been 3 days since I've used the pore strip, and while it did pull blackheads out, I'm left with a swollen, red, textured patch of skin in the shape of the pore strip.
customer_reviews.author: Jory

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: I will be going back to biore. These stuck well but did not clean out blackheads.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Tinch

customer_reviews.title: More for your $
customer_reviews.text: You get more than biore , that's good but don't see any difference in qaulity
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K

customer_reviews.title: Mild glue smell, but amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers note, it does have a semi strong smell but its nothing you don’t get used to. It DEFINITELY adheres to the nose and gets gunk out you didn’t even know you had. Bought a second pack for myself and even one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: ok ok
customer_reviews.text: not the best product out there but definitely worth the money. does a decent job but i just felt like they can make the product better for sure with how it shapes up and how it acts on your skin
customer_reviews.author: Siddiq

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: At first i thought it wasn't going to be good quality but these work better than boire nose strips. They are sticky but they work amazingly!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: But again
customer_reviews.text: Best ones I have found yet. The adhesive works & well. It really cleans pores but doesn’t pull out your nose stud, which I have two of lol
customer_reviews.author: Molly McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blackhead remover I have ever!! Even compared to some I had in Japan! Definitely I would recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: Just like biore but better value!
customer_reviews.text: Closest thing to biore strips I've ever came close to!! I really wish I can find an all over face mask that worked as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cole

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: These work as expected, but it's torture to smell them fro the 15 minutes they are adhered to my face. I can't stand the scent!
customer_reviews.author: Abiah83

customer_reviews.title: Best ones Ive tried yet
customer_reviews.text: So awesome! Ive used several different brands before these strips and these by far work the best!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These are comparable to the other more popular/expensive brand. They work just as well which is to say they are ok, not great.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not too thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Biore is better They are really thick take forever to dry and poor results adhering to blackheads
customer_reviews.author: Jenine

customer_reviews.title: it works!!
customer_reviews.text: these are actually pretty good. i never thought i’d find a cheaper alternative to the original biore pore strips!! i think the pieces are slightly thicker so its best to wet it in warm water first to soften it up! i love them!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Removes blackheads AND skin
customer_reviews.text: So much adhesion that it took the skin right off my nose. Threw the rest away.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Deep Clean!
customer_reviews.text: It works great, my first cleaning strip had so much gunk on it. It was so satisfyingly disgusting to look at. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Mint

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The work okay didnt remove as much as I thought but they still got quite a few
customer_reviews.author: Kat Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price.
customer_reviews.text: They had great adhesive. Almost but NOT too much. Hurt tiny bit but my 89 year old Dad commented on my fresh looking face after. That was a first! .
customer_reviews.author: DVC

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my Nose
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand before, but something about this new formulation caused my skin to get red and itchy right after using it. It's so red that I can't even cover it with makeup. My skin is super dry and disgusting after using it. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Would order again !
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage son. He’s only used 1 so far but they seem to work just fine ! Thanks Anjou !
customer_reviews.author: Dana  Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: Never buying biore again. These are a million times better!
customer_reviews.author: Ash Vu

customer_reviews.title: God Tier Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These strips are god tier awesome! I didn't even realize how rough my nose was until I pulled it off, and suddenly I learned what smooth was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dont buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't like these. They don't stick all that great and have this really nauseating perfumey smell. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works like any other pore strip. Good quantity for the price. Would buy again definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Linsey

customer_reviews.title: Finally strips that work!
customer_reviews.text: These seem to work best out of all nose strips we've used
customer_reviews.author: aefarrz

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes it does it’s job, but it’s a little more painful then others. The quantity you get for the price is amazing. Although it does leave a residue when you peel them off. DO NOT LEAVE ON FOR LONGER THAN THE INSTRUCTED TIME!!! IT WILL HURT.
customer_reviews.author: Aerolynn2001

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it works great but for them to work you have to have you're nose wet for it to stick, if it's dry it won't work
customer_reviews.author: Mariela

customer_reviews.title: The best pores strips.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, better than Biore or any of the other 4 brands I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Stick to name brand ones.
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t work as well as the name brand ones. Stuck well but didn’t pull anything out.
customer_reviews.author: The Henson’s

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price! Only complaint is the smell of them while using not very pleasant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Overall ok. Has an unpleasant scent. It dries very firm, but doesn't feel like it's getting that deep into your pores.
customer_reviews.author: JSim

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Pore Strip.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Biore pore strips and loved them, until I tried these. I think they take a bit longer to dry, but once they do, I think they are much more effective at getting that gunk out!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest
customer_reviews.text: Way better than any other store bought brands. Trust me, I've tried them all. Works best right out of the shower. Not great for anything besides the nose though.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like these but..
customer_reviews.text: Honestly cannot tell a difference after using them as recommended for a month. Leaves your nose dry and itchy. I know people who love these and told me to buy them so it really must depend on your skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: They're are like the ones at the drug store , nothing really special, you just get a lot more
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what the reviews crack it up to be. I bought this and used it as directed and it barely removed any black heads on my nose ( I have a ton) and it gave me a rash and burning sensation after I used it. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: No where near as good as biore pore strips, followed the directions but only see about 1/3 the results. They are ok but will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt clear my pores
customer_reviews.text: They definitely make my skin feel softer but I never see any access oil and dirt pulled out of my pores. I apply it correctly and leave it on for the recommended amount of time. It just doesnt work for me
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Effective but chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint is the smell when they get wet. It's chemical smelling! But the seen to work well so far
customer_reviews.author: Spartan-259 Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: They work better than any other strip I have tried
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pore strips!
customer_reviews.text: Best pore strips! Way better than biore and the other ones sold at target, Walmart, etc! I have super sensitive skin and these work well.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: No Stars if I  could
customer_reviews.text: I have used Biore strips in the past with no problems. I used these and there is a scab on the side of my nose from a reaction to the strips, Will go back to the Biore brand.
customer_reviews.author: Maryetta Petras

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! Barely any ingredients which is a plus, regarding chemicals. They do the job and are great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work so good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re thinking of buying this you should! These strips left my nose so soft after one use!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Tore Off Skin
customer_reviews.text: Decent job removing whiteheads but is super adhesive and can tear off skin on nose so beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: horrendous
customer_reviews.text: couldn’t even get the backs off of any of the strips , they are so thin and cheaply made i was so annoyed i whipped these nasties in the trash without hesitation, total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Parker Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Economical Pore Strips
customer_reviews.text: Adheres well, just make sure that your face is wet. Does its job for much cheaper than the Biore strips
customer_reviews.author: KAYE

customer_reviews.title: Need something stronger
customer_reviews.text: They work well but not enough for my deep pores
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Blackhead Remover Pore Strips Anjou Deep Cleansing Peel off Strip for Nose & Face, 32 Strips Last 4-6 Months
product_meta.description: Anjou Deep Cleansing Peel off Strip
feature_bullets: Effective for remove nose blackhead: Witch hazel extract and Dipotassium Glycyrrhizinate effectively remove blackheads from your nose in a natural way
Ergonomically Designed Shaped: The strips will fit even long tips of the nose and cover your whole nasal area perfectly
How to use: Clean and moisten nose with warm water, remove the strip and place it on your nose, wait for the strip to dry and then carefully peel it off starting from the corners
The Obvious Effect: Watch how blackheads and impurities stick to the strip and are being lifted off your nose without leaving any residue
Cost-Efficient Skin Care: With a recommended usage frequency of 1-2 times a week, the 32 nose strips will last you a whole of 4-6 months
